decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (  ) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The scheme of sound insulation shown on the approved drawings shall be carried out before any part of the development hereby permitted is occupied.

Condition : 4 - For noise emitted from fixed plant on the site the rating level shall be lower than the existing background noise level by 10dB. The noise levels shall be determined at the nearest noise sensitive locations (the surrounding residential properties). The measurements shall be made according to BS4142:1997.

Condition : 5 - The extraction system, odour control unit and flow outlet will all be implemented as in the submitted plans and to the specifications previously agreed with the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 6 - The extraction system, associated fan and odour control unit will be maintained and serviced at the manufacturer's recommended interval and standards.
description: Lowering of front terrace to match street level, alterations to shop front and installation of a kitchen extraction system to the rear fa?ade
